alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 11:49PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN BENTON... NORTHWESTERN CARROLL AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM CDT... At 1149 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Bella Vista to 2 miles northwest of Tontitown. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Bella Vista... Lowell... Pea Ridge... Holiday Island... Tontitown... Cave Springs... Highfill... Garfield... Gateway... Beaver... Hobbs State Park... War Eagle... Miller... Centerton... Elm Springs... Avoca... Beaver Lake... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 72 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
